response.original_title: Silver VS Red F1 2018 [Five or Nothing]
response.overview: After the Clash of Champions between Sebastian Vettel and Lewis Hamilton in the 2017 Formula 1 season, it's time for another round, in the next season. The 2018 Formula 1 season is a new opportunity for Vettel to beat Hamilton, who wants to maintain his crown as the reigning champion. Both are 4 times Formula 1 World Champion. This season, only one can conquest the Formula 1 throne, achieving the fifth title. This is Vettel vs Hamilton 2018, this is Silver vs Red F1 2018: It's Five or Nothing.
response.title: Silver VS Red F1 2018 [Five or Nothing]
